title: Full Time Support Worker
text:
We have an excellent opportunity to join our expanding team in the East Hampshire area.
Our service users are looking for Support worker's who are kind, compassionate and are prepared to offer everything from companionship, care support and providing personal care. This would be in the comfort of our service users’ homes. If you have experience with this, then great, but if you don’t we are able to provide full training to ensure that you are confident and competent in your role.
Responsibilities:
- Provide care and support to individuals in their homes or community
- Assist with daily activities, personal care, meal prep, and household tasks
- Foster independence by supporting them to attend social and recreational activities
- Maintaining accurate records
- Ensuring the safety and well-being of the individual
Requirements:
- Previous experience preferrable however if you are a compassionate person looking to get into Care. Full training will be given
- Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
- Empathy, patience, and a non-judgmental attitude
- Ability to work independently as well as part of a team
- Basic computer skills and proficiency in maintaining accurate records
- Valid driver's licence and access to reliable transportation
Benefits
- £150 Welcome Bonus*
- Discounted Gym Membership
- 20% discount on on in house Café food at any time
- Mileage and Travel paid
- Casual Dress
- No Nights!
- Employee reward schemes including the ability to win a free holiday.
- Discounts for shops, restaurants and more
- Small teams with dedicated manager to support you all the way
- Company mobile phone and any other equipment supplied free of charge.
*Terms & Conditions Apply
Reference: 51859660
Please note
Reed.co.uk does not communicate with candidates via Whatsapp, and we will never ask you to provide your bank, passport or driving licence details during the application process.
